Package sixmensmorris

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI
    This is the AI class for games with a computer/ The AI is implemented in a very basic way.
    Board
    This is an abstract representation of the game board.
    BoardController
    This is a controller for the board class.
    BoardView
    Creates the information that the controller will access in order to communicate to the user.
    Circle
    Defines a mathematical representation of a circle using its center point and radius.
    DebugController
    Creates the window and all labels or buttons needed to access and update the view which in turn will change values in the model.
    ErrorDialog
    Defines a dialog box to display error messages to the user.
    Game
    This class contains the main method, and all variables universal to the game.
    MenuController
    Defines a controller to mediate the views and models used in the menu.
    MenuView
    Defines a view for the menu screen.
    Player
    This class models a player.
    Point
    Defines a mathematical representation of a circle using its x-coordinate and its y-coordinate.
    Rectangle
    Defines a mathematical representation of a rectangle defined by the top left, top right, and bottom left corners.
    Screen
    Declares a function that will be used in classes that extend from it.
